verses.name: 1 Kings 13:5
verses.text: The altar also was rent, and the ashes poured out from the altar, according to the sign which the man of God had given by the word of the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Kings 13:6
verses.text: And the king answered and said unto the man of God, Intreat now the face of the Lord thy God, and pray for me, that my hand may be restored me again. And the man of God besought the Lord, and the king’s hand was restored him again, and became as it was before.
